tags: i dont really know what to do
summary: He'd never said that he loved the ginger git - EliasFinn - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: He'd never said that he loved the ginger git - EliasFinn - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 18/18
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
Relationships: Draco Malfoy/Ron Weasley, Luna Lovegood/Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley, Hermione Granger/Viktor Krum
Characters: Draco Malfoy, Ron Weasley, Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, Emma the therapy dog
:

5 Years after the war, Ron is tired of chasing down criminals and want to quit his job as an Auror, so he can start to work with George in the shop, but Harry begs him to help him with this last case.
Lucius Malfoy was brutally killed in Azkaban and Narcissa Malfoy was found critically injured in Malfoy Manor after she opened a letter, which was addressed to her son.
5 Years after the war and the trials Ron sees Draco Malfoy again, in Muggle London as a student at the art university, who is mute since the war, a small leftover of the Dark Lord.
To save Draco’s life, Ron is forced into a marriage bond with the ferret, while Harry tries to find the murderer.

Oh, and Draco has a therapy dog named Emma, because of his PTSD.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
Do not pity the dead ... Pity the living and above all, those who live without love.
You're the one who is weak. You will never...
body:
Do not pity the dead … Pity the living and above all, those who live without love.


You’re the one who is weak. You will never know love or friendship. And I feel sorry for you.

title: His Golden Girl
body:
by EpicShiznit

After Voldemort’s defeat, Harry and Ron decided to join the Ministry as Aurors. Unknown to each other, both Hermione and Draco return for their 7th year at Hogwarts, and what starts off as bitter beginning turned out to be the year that changes their lives forever. (Hermione x Draco / Hermione x Ron) Post-war

Words: 2571, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Hermione Granger, Draco Malfoy, Ron Weasley, Harry Potter, Ginny Weasley, Minerva McGonagall, Rubeus Hagrid, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Lucius Malfoy
  • Relationships: Hermione Granger/Draco Malfoy, Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley

summary:
Albus: dad i’m going to visit scorpius!
Harry: oh really? *pulls out a cage with a ferret in it*
Harry: take this with you...
body:
Albus: dad i’m going to visit scorpius!

Harry: oh really? *pulls out a cage with a ferret in it*

Albus: why?

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
Sirius: Oxygen went on a date with Potassium. It went OK
James: I thought Oxygen was dating Magnesium, OMG
Remus: Oxygen asked...
body:
Sirius: Oxygen went on a date with Potassium. It went OK

James: I thought Oxygen was dating Magnesium, OMG

Remus: Oxygen asked out Nitrogen but they said NO

McGonagall: I’m not exactly clear on how they learned all that stuff and what it means but. Fucking nerds. I love my kids

reblog.comment:

body:
Albus: Is Scorpius here Mr. Malfoy?
Draco: Yes, he's coming. How's your dad?
Albus: Well, working and stuff
Draco: Is he still beautiful?
Albus: What?
Draco: What?

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: Yes, he's coming. How's your dad?
